GeneralBackground.Purpose: The Company Engine is an internal system developed to collect and structure business information directly from websites, reducing reliance on external sources like yellow pages.
GeneralBackground.Evolution: Previously, company data was complemented with third-party sources. With the Company Engine, this information is now extracted directly, ensuring fresher and more complete data.

Description.ClientImpact: Fields may show new totals, value changes, or shifts in data quality. Performance may vary by country (e.g., AU performs well).

Access.Integration: All data is integrated into the Search Engine.

Industry.name: National Statistical Offices and Governments
Industry.UseCase: Used by agencies in the Netherlands, Germany, Mexico, Colombia, Brazil, and Chile to match national business registries with online presence.

Industry.name: Business Information
Industry.UseCase: Used by firms for credit risk assessment based on web-based business data, which often reflects the most current and connected business ecosystem.
